meanings.sent1: The disubstituted molecule contained two different parts.
meanings.sent2: The chemist identified the disubstituted compound in the solution.
meanings.sent3: The disubstituted puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: Her disubstituted earrings matched her outfit flawlessly.
meanings.sent5: The disubstituted flowers in the garden added a pop of color.

meanings.sent1: She disubstituted the old parts with new ones.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic disubstituted the damaged components in the engine.
meanings.sent3: He disubstituted the broken toy pieces with spare parts.
meanings.sent4: The chef disubstituted the original recipe ingredients for healthier options.
meanings.sent5: The artist disubstituted the dull colors with vibrant shades in the painting.
